charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2); Felon in possession of a firearm(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Thirty-seven (37) months imprisonment, three (3) years supervised release, $100.00 special assessment. SUPERVISED RELEASE JUDGMENT. Defendant's supervised release is revoked. Eleven (11) months imprisonment. No additional supervised release to be imposed. Defendant is ordered to self-report to the designated facility or United States Marshal for the Middle District of North Carolina on August 10, 2018 at noon. Pending self-reporting, the defendant shall submit to substance abuse testing after July 12, 2018.
